banner.title: Essential oils in the fight against bacteria
banner.description: Thyme and rosemary under the scrutiny of P.U.M.A. scientists. Discover how natural oils can enhance antibiotic action and become a weapon in the era of bacterial resistance.

banner2.title: Between science and practice - how P.U.M.A. works
banner2.description: The P.U.M.A. Laboratory combines basic research with practical applications. Learn more about our work in the UMW University Magazine - year 2025 September/October at pages 9 to 11.
